summary: It replaces the female monk boots with the boots found in the archmage quarters.
descriptionHtml:
I did this mod because a lot of boots have clipping problems with archmages robes; and the boots found in the archmages quarters look pretty good with the archmages robes.

Well, I\'m not a modder. Technically, this would be my first mod. The meshes found in this mod are Bethesda\'s archmages boots meshes, I choosed to replace the monk boots but you are free to choose any other boots, of course. Make sure to put these meshes in the right folder inside your skyrim\'s data folder [.\\Data\\Meshes\\Clothes\\Monk\\].

If you want the boots, you can buy them in Solitude\'s Radiant Rainment

They should work fine with any mod, unless another mod does replace these meshes of course.

If you are wondering why my archmage robes look like that, I used these mods:

Hoodless Archmage Robes Royal Recolour -Eight Colours- by MessiasMummo 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10238
Hoodless Archmage Robes by ReaverOfSouls 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7879

CREDITS:

To Bethesda of course, for this amazing game.
To MessiasMummo for the Hoodless Archmage Robes Royal Recolour -Eight Colours- mod 
To ReaverOfSouls for the Hoodless Archmage Robes mod
author: Zephidel Aka Dallian - In some websites -
